channel.title: art on Michael Pilosov: The Archives
channel.description: Recent content in art on Michael Pilosov: The Archives

item.title: Probably Art
item.description: Please pardon our mess. This page is still a work in progress. I have many projects that I am documenting simultaneously and am doing my best to be thorough and embed a lot of rich metadata so that you can click around based on what you find interesting. Please feel free to contact me if you want me to finish this particular page immediately.

item.title: Moving Pictures
item.description: My time as a Geneseo Foundation STEM Undergraduate Summer Research Fellow. Summer Research Readings Course (follow up) Please pardon our mess. This page is still a work in progress. I have many projects that I am documenting simultaneously and am doing my best to be thorough and embed a lot of rich metadata so that you can click around based on what you find interesting.
